alfredsnippet.snippet:
Conversations with God, Neale Donald Walsch, Book 3, p.148

"Why can't we see such obvious truths on our own? Because if you saw these truths, you would have to do something about them. This you do not wish to do. So you have no choice but to look right at something and not see it."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - You Have No Choice But to Look Right at Something and Not See It
